players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Everyone, I investigated Alice last night and discovered they are the mafioso. We should vote to arrest Alice today."
Bob: "Charlie claims to be the detective and accuses Alice. Alice, do you have anything to say in your defense?"
Bob: "Charlie's claim seems credible since Alice hasn't defended themselves. Unless Alice speaks up, I think we should consider voting for Alice."
